enumtype.name: org.rapidbeans.rapidenv.config.file.FileCopyCondition
enumtype.description: Defines under which condition to copy a file to an installation folder.

enum.name: notexist
enum.description: Copy only if the target file does not exist. The file can be changed indiviually after installation.

enum.name: sourcenewer
enum.description: Copy only if the source file is newer that the target file.

enum.name: diff
enum.description: Copy every time the target file differs from the source file. THis ist the strictest rule.
